label:before{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:0;left:14%;background-color:hsla(0,0%,61.6%,.3);height:1px;width:150px}.products__list__product .content p{font-weight:300;font-size:17px;line-height:23px}.references-guides__content__box{padding:60px 50px}.references-guides__content__box__content .description{font-weight:400;font-size:17px;line-height:23px}.free-shipping__content{padding:0 5rem}.free-shipping__content h2{font-weight:700;font-size:30px;line-height:41px}.free-shipping__content p{font-weight:500;font-size:22px;margin-top:.5rem;line-height:30px}.shop-category__container__bottom,.shop-category__container__top{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;width:100%;gap:20px}.shop-category__container__bottom .box,.shop-category__container__top .box{border-right:1px solid hsla(0,0%,61.6%,.3)}.shop-category__container__bottom .box:nth-child(6),.shop-category__container__bottom .box:nth-child(12),.shop-category__container__top .box:nth-child(6),.shop-category__container__top .box:nth-child(12){border-right:none}.shop-category__container__bottom{margin-top:2rem}.products__list{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;gap:40px}.motto__content{padding:0 5rem}.free-shipping{margin:0 5rem}}
